metadata.title: Why Veterans are Built for AI: The Shift all Veterans Need to Know
metadata.description: Artificial Intelligence has taken over the national conversation, usually with a warning label attached. Every day, there’s another prediction about jobs disappearing, industries being automated, or machines replacing human skills entirely. For many people, AI feels less like a tool and more like an oncoming storm. However, for veterans, you were built for this.
metadata.author: Douglas Lindsay
